name: Slime Attack (FunkyGenetics)
description:
Slime Attack is a 2D platform survival shooter inspired by. You are Zorg an alien slime buster sent from planet Bong to clean up the mess that the rebel slime balls have caused from bouncing all over the planet leaving a sticky residue everywhere. 

Your aim is to survive the onslaught and defeat the source of the slime! 

Slimes drop special orbs that give Zorg abilities! collect them when they drop!

Controls:

A / D  or Left / Right arrows to move.

W or Up arrow to jump.

Spacebar to shoot.
